thread.title: Mt. Lebanon High library dedicated to 1952 alumnus
thread.title_full: Mt. Lebanon High library dedicated to 1952 alumnus

title: Mt. Lebanon High library dedicated to 1952 alumnus
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Education - Today 
The new Mt. Lebanon High School library will bear the name of 1952 alumnus Richard J. Madden, who has donated $585,000 in scholarship funds ...
